analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x1c6b16f415e7f35f0ec5d84bb53612421d90c832.sol:
	Contract ERC20Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x1c6b16f415e7f35f0ec5d84bb53612421d90c832.sol#378-380)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/34/0x1c6b16f415e7f35f0ec5d84bb53612421d90c832.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/34/0x1c6b16f415e7f35f0ec5d84bb53612421d90c832.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/34/0x1c6b16f415e7f35f0ec5d84bb53612421d90c832.sol#136) is not in mixedCase
